boardgame.name: Wings of War: Rugdekking Verplicht!
Wings of War: Watch Your Back!
boardgame.description: Wings of War: Watch Your Back! is the second title in the WoW line and is again set in World War I._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game can be played by itself or mixed with Wings of War: Famous Aces for larger scenarios. It includes 5 models of planes: the Nieuport 11, Hanriot HD.1 and Halberstadt D.III fighters, together with the British/American DH4 and the Austrian Ufag C.I two-seaters. There are also 4 decks of movement cards, 1 deck of combat cards, rulers, counters and a promo card for the first set depicting an American SPAD XIII._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The rulebook is the same as Wings of War: Famous Aces and it lists scenarios for each of the two boxes, plus a couple for players who own both of them._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;18 airplane cards are for immediate use. A curious plane, useful for more variated scenarios, is the Nieuport 11 of the German Jasta 1, flown in action by Leutnant Gustav Leffers. In the box there are also a few weapon variants for owners of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Famous aces_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;: Scaroni's and Fucini's HD.1 with twin machineguns instead of the single one that was the standard from the factory; a British DH4 with a twin machinegun in the rear arc; a DH4 of the American Expeditionary Force with twin machineguns both on the forward and on the rear arc._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: never played +++++ german manual, but the game parts are completely language independet and you can find an english translation here on boardgamegeek +++++ will be shipped with insurance only +++++ payment for usa, canada, asia or australia : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for other non-euro-currency countries in europe : paypal, cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : cash (by letter) or bank transfer (wich by the way is cost-free !) +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ for all : no cheques ! +++++ foreign buyers beware : german postal sadly is very expensive for foreign packages (about 18 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped and the weight), please ask for shipping prices, before you buy !) +++++ shipping inside germany will cost 8 euros, including insurance

All our games are brand new in shrink wrap. Buyer pays for shipping. Shipping will depend on your location and the weight of game. We will discount shipping on multiple games orders whenever possible to ensure the fairest rate. We are not responsible for lost mail but will insure shipment, at your request. Items are shipped within one business day of receiving payment. Payment must be received within 7 days after the day you agreed to buy the item, and all PayPal or credit card payments must be made within this time period. If payment isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t received within these time periods, all orders will be revoked and proper feedback will be left. Unopened merchandise may be returned within 14 days of purchase for a full refund, less original shipping charges. Return shipping charges are the responsibility of the customer with the exception of defective merchandise. To return an item, please contact us prior to sending an item back to us. WA orders pay 8.5% sales tax. Please email us with any questions. Thanks Chum Chum Games chumchumgames@yahoo.com

Fantasy Flight Games (FFG WW02) Roaring two-seater planes fly over the trenches on recon missions, bombing runs, trench strafing, and daring rescues... Can you escort your planes to their targets and safely back home? Or can you prevent your opponent_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s planes from striking at the heart of your forces? Watch Your Back! can be played by itself or mixed with Famous Aces to play larger scenarios. It includes five types of planes: the Nieuport 11, Hanriot HD.1 and Halberstadt D.III fighters, and the British/American DH4 and the Austrian Ufag C.I two-seaters.

In shrinkwrap. Perfect. I store my games in a pet-free and smoke-free environment and I package my games for shipment with the utmost care. I ship quickly - within 24 hours of receiving payment. Shipping weight is 5 pounds.

My late husband was an avid board game collector. It is time for the games to find new homes, hopefully to someone who enjoys them as much as he did. All his games are in excellent condition, he took very good care of them. If he did play the games, no eating or drinking was allowed. Please feel free to ask any questions. Thank you!
